title: All Latvian council chairpersons to be vetted by January
summary_full: Most local government officials have already received the state security clearance required by law, and the situation with the remaining ones will be known in January, said Raimonds Čudars (New Unity), Minister of Smart Administration and Regional Development (VARAM), in an interview with Latvian Television's program "Morning Panorama" on 10th December.
